name: Siters's Fury
description:
A wild old school Beat Em Up game appears!!!

In a no so far future, streets are ruled by all kind of gangs.

You play as Skylar a former gang member, that recently left that life by request of his sister, although it would not take her long to realize that it was not going to be so easy.

Your objective, clear the streets by using the always easy and reliable violence, to find Skylar's recently kidnapped sister.

CREDITS:

Fonts by Tiny Worlds

Pixel-Art and Music by Ansimuz
